description: DGC Member values engaging with academic institutions at the student or research level.
DGC Member values spreading, growing or diversifying the Maker community.
DGC Member values compliance and regulation where appropriate for Dijets.
DGC Member values data availability and data-driven decision-making.
DGC Member values decentralization of Dijets, its Ecosystem and its Domains.
DGC Member values growth of Dijets and adoption of the Ecosystem.
DGC Member values innovation and creativity in problem-solving and direction.
DGC Member values the expansion of the Ecosystem onto other blockchains.
DGC Member values pragmatic responses to problems facing Dijets.
DGC Member values responsibility to all stakeholders that interact with Dijets and the Ecosystem.
DGC Member values increasing the revenue of the Ecosystem and expanding to new revenue streams.
DGC Member values appropriate management of risks for the Ecosystem and Dijets.
DGC Member values scalability of Dijets and its Ecosystem
DGC Member values Dijets security when expanding and changing functionality.
DGC Member values simplicity and comprehensibility when determining courses of action.
DGC Member values social and environmental sustainability as a direction for Dijets.
DGC Member values extending trust and confidence to individuals working for Dijets.
DGC Member values providing leadership, direction and vision for Dijets.
DGC Member values focus on long-term goals and helps align Dijets actors.
